GenAiFunction.description:
Use this action to create or modify SObject records in the org. The Action is very generic so that also other APIs that the Salesforce REST API could be called.
**IMPORTANT: Do NOT use this action for querying/reading data! Always use QueryRecordsWithSoql for any SOQL queries instead.**
This action is intended for: - Creating new records (POST requests) - Updating existing records (PATCH requests) - Deleting records (DELETE requests) - Other REST API operations that modify data
For querying data, always use the dedicated QueryRecordsWithSoql action which handles both regular queries and aggregate queries properly.
